Title: Ensures that the provisions governing liquor licenses are consistent with respect to public interest factors
Summary: Ensures that the provisions governing liquor licenses are consistent with respect to public interest factors.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to making the provisions governing the various on-premises liquor licenses consistent with respect to public interest factors that may be considered by the state liquor authority when evaluating the merits of a license application
